snippet: David P. Atkins, a lawyer, writes that the parties defending traditional marriage before the Supreme Court are “hardly clients without the influence or resources to effectively advocate for their position.”
lead_paragraph: David P. Atkins, a lawyer, writes that the parties defending traditional marriage before the Supreme Court are “hardly clients without the influence or resources to effectively advocate for their position.”

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
